id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [MAX44009 Ambient Light Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max44009.html#configuration-variables)*

mode.docs:
**string**: Measurement mode. One of `auto`, `low_power`, `continuous`.

*See also: [MAX44009 Ambient Light Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max44009.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [MAX44009 Ambient Light Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max44009.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x4A`.

*See also: [MAX44009 Ambient Light Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/max44009.html#configuration-variables)*
